name: Retreat When Hull < 90%
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when its hull integrity falls below %s. This order will only be given once.

name: Retreat When Hull < 60%
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when its hull integrity falls below %s. This order will only be given once.

name: Retreat When Hull < 30%
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when its hull integrity falls below %s. This order will only be given once.

name: Retreat When Missiles Expended
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when it has no missile ammo left. This order will only be given once.

name: Retreat When Performance Degraded
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when it has exceeded its peak performance time. This order will only be given once.

name: Retreat When CR < 60%
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when it has exceeded its peak performance time and it is below %s CR. This order will only be given once.

name: Retreat When CR < 40%
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when it has exceeded its peak performance time and it is below %s CR. This order will only be given once.

name: Retreat When CR = 0%
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when it has exceeded its peak performance time and it is at %s CR. This order will only be given once.

name: Assign Timid Commander
desc: Assigns a %s commander to this ship, overriding the faction commander aggression doctrine. If an officer is assigned to this ship, the officer's personality will override this hullmod.

name: Assign Cautious Commander
desc: Assigns a %s commander to this ship, overriding the faction commander aggression doctrine. If an officer is assigned to this ship, the officer's personality will override this hullmod.

name: Assign Steady Commander
desc: Assigns a %s commander to this ship, overriding the faction commander aggression doctrine. If an officer is assigned to this ship, the officer's personality will override this hullmod.

name: Assign Aggressive Commander
desc: Assigns an %s commander to this ship, overriding the faction commander aggression doctrine. If an officer is assigned to this ship, the officer's personality will override this hullmod.

name: Assign Reckless Commander
desc: Assigns a %s commander to this ship, overriding the faction commander aggression doctrine. If an officer is assigned to this ship, the officer's personality will override this hullmod.

name: Vent When Flux > 80%
desc: Forces the ship to vent when it exceeds %s flux. This does not work while the player is on-board the ship, even while using auto-pilot.
